work_summary: Activated as co-captain for Agents 5,6,7,8. Updated status to CO_CAPTAIN_MODE. Sent directives to agents 6,7,8 to stop acknowledgment loops and focus on actionable work.
decisions_made: Co-captain operating principle: focus on deliverables, not confirmations
Coordination directives explicitly state 'No ack needed - just execute'
Eliminated acknowledgment loops as primary coordination efficiency improvement
tradeoffs: Removing acknowledgment requirements improves speed but requires agents to trust directives without confirmation
Co-captain role adds leadership responsibility while maintaining execution capability

immediate_priorities: Continue Navigation Enhancement tasks (cross-references in core service files)
Monitor analytics validation readiness (re-run when Agent-3 deploys real IDs)
Continue SSOT tagging coordination with Agent-8
blockers: GA4/Pixel ID configuration (Agent-3) blocks Tier 1 analytics validation
dependencies: Agent-3 configuration of wp-config.php IDs for analytics validation

knowledge_persisted: Co-captain coordination pattern: directives without acknowledgment requirements
